com.foxhole.tools.spartan.forms
Interface IFormPosition

All Known Implementing Classes:
PositionalGameState
public interface IFormPosition

The interface that describes the position data for a form.

Author:
Tiago "Spiegel" Costa

setCenterPosition

void setCenterPosition(org.newdawn.slick.geom.Vector2f centerPosition)
Sets the center position of the object. Add rotations and scales use this point as reference. The coordinates for this point refer to the coordinates (0,0) of the form, so in order to put the center of rotation on a image with 200 width and 100 height, the center of rotation should be (100, 50). Even thought the position of the image form might change the center of rotation wont.

Parameters:
centerPosition - a vector containing the x,y coordinate of the center position point.

setCenterPosition

void setCenterPosition(float x,
                       float y)
Sets the center position of the object. Add rotations and scales use this point as reference. The coordinates for this point refer to the coordinates (0,0) of the form, so in order to put the center of rotation on a image with 200 width and 100 height, the center of rotation should be (100, 50). Even thought the position of the image form might change the center of rotation wont.

Parameters:
x - a float containing the X coordinate of the center position point.
y - a float containing the Y coordinate of the center position point.

a float containing the value of the X coordinate

getDifferenceAngle

float getDifferenceAngle()
Deprecated. no need for this method

Obtains the difference angle between the rotation and the direction.

Returns:
a float with the difference angle in degrees

getCollisionShape

org.newdawn.slick.geom.Shape getCollisionShape()
Obtains the collision shape for this object. The collision shape is dynamic and rotates, scales and translates along with the form.

Returns:
a Slick2d Shape representing the shape

setCollisionShape

void setCollisionShape(org.newdawn.slick.geom.Shape shape)
Sets a new collision shape for this form

Parameters:
shape - a Slick2d Shape representing the new shape
